CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Although the best PCE is still not high enough for commercial use , our optimization by designing suitable molecular structures , selecting different solvents and changing other factors could provide useful information for further studies of the commercialized PSCs .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCE |
| PSCs |

Explanation:

* PCE (Polymer-based Carbon Electrodes) is a type of material used in perovskite solar cells.
* PSCs (Perovskite Solar Cells) are a type of solar cell that contains a perovskite-structured compound, most commonly a hybrid organic-inorganic lead or tin halide-based material, as the light-harvesting active layer.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCE |

Explanation:

* PCE (Polymer-based Carbon Electrodes) is a type of material used in perovskite solar cells.

PSCs (Perovskite Solar Cells) are not considered as a material name in this context, it is a type of solar cell that contains a perovskite-structured compound, most commonly a hybrid organic-inorganic lead or tin halide-based material, as the light-harvesting active layer.
